mapper.sql: select rs.studycafe_rsv_no, rs.studyroom_no, rs.member_no, rs.rsv_dt, rs.using_dt, rs.start_time, rs.using_time, rs.people, rs.total_price, if(rs.review=1,'false','true') review, rst.rsv_status_no, rst.rsv_name, c.cafe_no, c.name cafe_name, sr.name roomName from studycafe_reservation rs join studycafe_reservation_status rst on rs.rsv_status_no=rst.rsv_status_no join studycafe_room sr on rs.studyroom_no=sr.studyroom_no join studycafe c on sr.cafe_no=c.cafe_no
mapper.select: where rs.member_no=#{memberNo} order by rs.studycafe_rsv_no asc
where c.member_no=#{ceoNo} order by rs.studycafe_rsv_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into studycafe_reservation (studyroom_no, member_no, using_dt, start_time,using_time, people, total_price, rsv_status_no, review) values(#{roomNo},#{member.perNo},#{useDate},#{startTime},#{useTime},#{useMemberNumber},#{totalPrice},#{reservationStatus},1)
mapper.update: update studycafe_reservation set review=2 where studycafe_rsv_no=#{reservationNo}
